lyrics.stanza: Oh, what a Savior that He died for me! From condemnation He hath made me free; "He that believeth on the Son" saith He, "Hath everlasting life."
"Verily, verily, I say unto you;" "Verily, verily," message ever new! "He that believeth on the Son"—'tis true!— "Hath everlasting life!"
All my iniquities on Him were laid, All my indebtedness by Him was paid; All who believe on Him, the Lord hath said, "Hath everlasting life."
Though all unworthy, yet I will not doubt; For him that cometh He will not cast out: "He that believeth"—oh, the good news shout! "Hath everlasting life."
